job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: <p><strong>Designation: </strong></p><p><strong>Project Tech. Lead (4A): 5 – 7 Years</strong></p><p><strong>Project Manager/Architect (4B/5A): 7 – 10 Years</strong></p><p><strong>&nbsp;</strong></p><p><strong>Role and responsibilities</strong></p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Project Management (50%)</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Front Door (Requirements, Metadata collection, classification &amp; security clearance)</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Data pipeline template development</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Data pipeline Monitoring development &amp; support (operations)</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Design, develop, deploy, and maintain production-grade scalable data transformation, machine learning and deep learning code, pipelines; manage data and model versioning, training, tuning, serving, experiment and evaluation tracking dashboards.</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Manage ETL and machine learning model lifecycle: develop, deploy, monitor, maintain, and update data and models in production.</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Build and maintain tools and infrastructure for data processing for AI/ML development initiatives.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p><strong>Technical skills requirements</strong></p><p>The candidate must demonstrate proficiency in,</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Experience deploying machine learning models into production environment.</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Strong DevOps, Data Engineering and ML background with Cloud platforms</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Experience in containerization and orchestration (such as Docker, Kubernetes)</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Experience with ML training/retraining, Model Registry, ML model performance measurement using ML Ops open source frameworks.</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Experience building/operating systems for data extraction, ingestion and processing of large data sets</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Experience with MLOps tools such as MLFlow and Kubeflow</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Experience in Python scripting</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Experience with CI/CD</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Fluency in Python data tools e.g. Pandas, Dask, or Pyspark</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Experience working on large scale, distributed systems</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Python/Scala for data pipelines</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Scala/Java/Python for micro-services and APIs</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;HDP, Oracle skills &amp; Sql; Spark, Scala, Hive and Oozie DataOps (DevOps, CDC)</p><p><strong>&nbsp;</strong></p><p><strong>Nice-to-have skills</strong></p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Jenkins, K8S</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Google Cloud certification</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Unix or Shell scripting</p>
